mcq.statement: Choose the correct pair for homology? A. Wings of birds and wings of butterfly B. Forelimbs of birds and fins of whales C. Leaves of pines and cactus D. Gills of fish and lungs of humans

options.a: Wings of birds and wings of butterfly
options.b: Forelimbs of birds and fins of whales
options.d: Gills of fish and lungs of humans
